data.eml:eml: Revision of the genus Pachystethus Blanchard with description of three new species from Mexico (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae: Rutelinae: Anomalini)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ramírez-Ponce, Andrés, Morón, Miguel Angel (2012): Revision of the genus Pachystethus Blanchard with description of three new species from Mexico (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae: Rutelinae: Anomalini). Zootaxa 3394: 1-24, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.210542
